answers.answer: What is he taking? Have you tried a Google medication search followed by the words side effects?

question: My husband was diagnosed with Diabetes this summer.  Lately, he's has a blue dash that he sees all the time in one eye.  He just saw another blue dash in the other eye.  He's been to an Eye MD Opthalmologist and he found nothing wrong with his eyes.Does this have to do with Diabetes or the medication he's taking?
title: Blue Dashes in eyes
